title: Waltmoor Rd is like a war zone and has been for a long time and the work seems very slow. I realize they ran into some issues. What is the exact date the contractor has been given to finish the contract? Exactly when did they begin work? 2013?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2015/01/whats-latest-completion-date-waltmoor-road-work/
